game.name: Cube Runner
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cube Runner is a 3d action platformer that's simple to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge even the greatest gamers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cube Runner is a 3d action platformer that's simple to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge even the greatest gamers.

reviewHighlights.text: I opened the game, closed the game, and lost faith in humanity. And yes, it's priced like there's a diamond iceberg inside.
This game should be considered as one of the deadly sins, worst hour of my life. I would rather watch my family die in a brutal car crash right before...
